@@ -510,2 +510,5 @@
-    // Not vectorized: no vector div. Might vectorize after JDK-8282365
-    // (transform div to mul/add/shift).
+    @Test
+    @IR(counts = { IRNode.ADD_VI,    "> 0",
+                   IRNode.RSHIFT_VI, "> 0",
+                   IRNode.SUB_VI,    "> 0" },
+        applyIfCPUFeatureOr = {"sse2", "true", "asimd", "true"})
@@ -518,2 +521,5 @@
